document.heading: Retail Service Station Amendment Act of 2007

history.narrative: Law 17-80, the “Retail Service Station Amendment Act of 2007”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-142 which was referred to the Committee of Public Services and Consumer Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 2, 2007, and November 6, 2007, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 26, 2007, it was assigned Act No. 17-191 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-80 became effective on January 29, 2008.
